name: File
description: The File connector allows you to connect to Local and remote (using protocols FTP, FTPS, SFTP) file systems and perform file related operations. The file connector uses the Apache Commons VFS I/O functionalities to execute operations. (Note: You need to have U2 updated versions after 25 th JUL 2023 up to MI-1.2.0 to MI-4.2.0)

operations.name: init
operations.description: Init operation

operations.name: createDirectory
operations.description: Creates a new directory on directory path.

operations.name: listFiles
operations.description: Lists all the files in the directory path that match a matcher.

operations.name: delete
operations.description: Deletes the file specified by the path.

operations.name: copy
operations.description: Copies the file or folder specified by sourcePath into targetPath.

operations.name: move
operations.description: Moves the file or folder specified by sourcePath into targetPath.

operations.name: rename
operations.description: Rename the file to the new name specified.

operations.name: unzip
operations.description: Unzip file to target directory.

operations.name: splitFile
operations.description: Split a file into multiple smaller files.

operations.name: mergeFiles
operations.description: Merge multiple files in a folder to a single file.

operations.name: checkExist
operations.description: Check if a file or directory exists.

operations.name: exploreZipFile
operations.description: List Items In ZIP File Without Extracting.

operations.name: compress
operations.description: Compress file or folder.

operations.name: read
operations.description: Read a specific file or a file in a folder.

operations.name: write
operations.description: Create a file or write content to a file.

connections.name: LOCAL
connections.description: Connection for the local file system.

connections.name: FTP
connections.description: Connection for an FTP server.

connections.name: FTPS
connections.description: Secure connection for an FTPS server.

connections.name: SFTP
connections.description: Secure connection for an SFTP server.

connections.name: SMB2
connections.description: Connection for an SMB2 file share.
